thread.section_title: Planet of the Vapes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Planet of the Vapes | planetofthevapes.com | 4 of 72
thread.title: Allan
thread.title_full: Planet of the Vapes reviewed by Allan

author: Allan
title: Allan
text:
My 1st vape was the matrix everything about it was sub par and the customer service SUCKED and my reviews were never posted. I was really hesitant to buy another vape. I did not want to smoke from a bowl any more so after starting the review process again I decided to buy the CFV. I'm so happy with this. I get very nice clouds, its easy to use, its built well.
The only thing I hate is that Planet gives you 2 gifts a grinder and a plastic container to hold some of your dry herb, valuing these gifts at $53.00 I DON'T THING SO. Don't get me wrong they are gifts and I appreciate them but don't say they are worth $53.00 say 20.00 Everybody will respect you more.
